original_text: Wicked people will surely not enjoy a good life. Their lives will be like a shadow that quickly disappears. They do not respect God, so they will not live for a long time.
korean_text: 악인은 잘 되지 못하며 장수하지 못하고 그 날이 그림자와 같으리니 이는 하나님을 경외하지 아니함이니라

sentences.original_text: Wicked people will surely not enjoy a good life.
sentences.korean_translation: 악인은 반드시 좋은 삶을 누리지 못할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Their lives will be like a shadow
so they will not live for a long time.
